fields.name: Perks:
fields.value:
Feral Frenzy: If another player shares a board edge with you, roll an extra d6.
Feral Slash: Rent is tripled.
Mad Grit: Every time a player pays rent, move 5 extra spaces.
Split: If you choose to, roll and move 4 times, each from your current space, activating all 4 spaces you land on/pass by, then choose which space of the 4 to continue from.

Perks cost $200 each; Feral Frenzy must be bought first, but the other 3 may be bought in any order.
